patthana23.14:4.1: Nakusalaṃ namicchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.14:5.1: Nakusalaṃ nasammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.14:6.1: Nakusalaṃ naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.14:6.3: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
